owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

publishTermRoot(bytes32,string,uint256).details: Only IU Vietnam (owner) can publish term roots

params._totalStudents: Number of students included in this term
params._verkleRoot: The Verkle tree root for this academic term

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

verifyReceiptAnchor(bytes32).details: Students include blockchain_anchor in their receipts for verification

params._blockchainAnchor: The Verkle root from student's receipt

returns.isValid: Whether this anchor exists on blockchain
returns.termId: The term this anchor belongs to

getPublishedRoot(uint256).notice: Gets a published root by index

getPublishedRootsCount().notice: Returns total number of published term roots

getTermRootInfo(bytes32).notice: Gets information about a published term root

publishTermRoot(bytes32,string,uint256).notice: Publishes a term's Verkle root commitment

verifyReceiptAnchor(bytes32).notice: Verifies if a receipt's blockchain anchor is valid
